headline: Ask HN: Why do you have to touch a USB security key?
description: Why do you have to touch a YubiKey and similar security keys? I get the "something you have" principle, but by the same token (pun intended) I can have something without touching it with my bare finger.
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 为什么一定要碰一个USB安全钥匙？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 為什麼一定要碰一個USB安全鑰匙？
description_zh-Hans: Why do you have to touch a YubiKey and similar security keys? I get the "something you have" principle, but by the same token (pun intended) I can have something without touching it with my bare finger.
